About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

A Front-End developer who believes in solving daily life problems also with coding. I am too much enthusiastic guy for coding. Graduated in Computer Science Engineering (2020 batch) with 78.33% aggregate from The Technological Institute Of Textile & Sciences, Bhiwani. Currently wokring as a Associate software developer in an IT company.

Thoughts2Binary Consultng Solutions & LLP, Gurugram

Associate Software Devoloper

Here I am working as frontend developer majorly on React, Redux, Material-UI, AngularJs, Bootstrap and Sass.

Worked on Australia based project named IndigoHub Annual Loan Review. It's basically a bank loan review system project which keep track of all the loan issued in past regarding their renewal date, due amount, lender info. etc.

Currently on US based project named Quivers. It's an e-commerce order exchange platform site which takes care of all the orders placed by users on different platforms like wooCommerce, shopify, BigCommerce etc. It takes all orders from these platform and keep track for those from their placement to delivery to the user.
